title: Neighbours: 10 best moments from the Australian soap
description: After more than 37 years on TV, here are some of the moments the soap will be remembered for most.

title: Commonwealth Games: Tom Daley protests anti-LGBT laws at opening ceremony
description: Watch diving star Tom Daley carry the Queen's baton in support of LGBT rights during the opening ceremony of the 2022 Commonwealth Games in Birmingham.

title: Commonwealth Games: Watch opening ceremony best bits including Duran Duran, Lenny Henry & Tom Daley
description: Watch the best bits from an entertainment-packed 2022 Commonwealth Games opening ceremony in Birmingham featuring royalty, an athletes parade, a giant bull and live music from Duran Duran.

title: Washington DC at 'tipping point' as migrants arrive from border
description: Texas and Arizona have transported thousands of migrants north in protest over the Biden border policy.

title: Gorgosaurus: Ancient dinosaur skeleton sells for $6m at auction
description: The Gorgosaurus - a "fiercer" cousin of the T-rex - is the first of its kind sold to a private buyer.

title: Devon Allen joins Philadelphia Eagles - nine days after disappointing World Athletics Championships exit
description: Hurdler Devon Allen reports for duty with the NFL's Philadelphia Eagles - nine days after suffering a disappointing exit at the World Athletics Championships.

title: Teenage pilot could fly before he could drive
description: Liam Garrett, 18, funded his flying career by working 900 hours in a local supermarket.

title: Are we set for a general strike?
description: Rampant inflation is leading to demands for higher pay offers and promises of coordinated industrial action.

title: Quiz of the week: What did the EuroMillions winner splash out on?
description: How closely have you been paying attention to what's been going on over the past seven days?

title: Sebastian Vettel: Four-time world champion to retire from Formula 1 at end of 2022 season
description: Four-time world champion Sebastian Vettel is to retire from Formula 1 at the end of the current season.

title: NHS to close Tavistock child gender identity clinic
description: It follows criticism of England's only children's gender identity clinic in an independent review.

title: Cardiff dad and son's funeral held after Bangladesh 'poisoning'
description: The father and son from Cardiff died on Tuesday, police suspect the family was poisoned.

title: Euro 2022: Inside England's camp before Wembley final
description: The Lionesses may be preparing for the biggest match in their history - but how have they been keeping themselves busy behind the scenes?

title: Bernard Cribbins: Doctor Who and Wombles star dies aged 93
description: Actor and singer Bernard Cribbins, whose career in TV and film spanned seven decades, dies aged 93.

title: Man jailed for killing in first TV sentencing
description: Ben Oliver is jailed in the first filmed hearing inside criminal courts in England and Wales.

title: Martin Lewis urges more help over 'desperate' energy bills
description: The personal finance expert says people will be "panicking" and have to "make awful choices".

title: Saudi women in Sydney: Sisters' bodies lay undiscovered for a month
description: The sisters' bodies lay undiscovered for a month, and seven weeks later, police do not know the cause.

title: Neighbours finale: Final episode airs in Australia after 37 years
description: After 37 years, the iconic TV soap draws to an emotional close with a reunion of past stars.

title: Tory leadership: Nadine Dorries defends Claire's Accessories attack on Rishi Sunak
description: The culture secretary also accuses the ex-chancellor of leading a "ruthless coup" against Boris Johnson.

title: Vanessa Feltz leaving her BBC Radio 2 and BBC Radio London shows
description: The presenter will leave the two programmes she presents on BBC Radio 2 and BBC Radio London.

title: Official UK Chart Show: Radio 1 reveals Jack Saunders as new presenter
description: Jack Saunders will take charge of the weekly music singles countdown after Scott Mills' departure.

title: KitKat maker Nestle puts up prices again
description: The Swiss food giant has increased prices by 6.5% due to "unprecedented" rises in costs.

title: From Wombles to Doctor Who: Cribbins' career in video
description: The actor has died at the age of 93.

title: Obituary: Bernard Cribbins
description: The versatile star of Doctor Who and the voice of the Wombles was known by generations of children.

title: Commonwealth Games 2022: Raise the roof...by order of the Peaky Blinders
description: A host of famous Birmingham faces invite you to "raise the roof" for the 2022 Commonwealth Games.

title: Birmingham to welcome pivotal Commonwealths
description: Seventy-two teams, 6,500 athletes and officials, 19 sports, a history under debate, a future to be defined - the Commonwealth Games is about to begin.

title: No extra bank holiday even if England women win Euros, says government
description: Despite calls from some fans, there will be no extra day off work if England's women beat Germany.

title: Why I want to talk about STIs in the black community
description: Cherry Wilson looks into why sexually transmitted infection rates are higher in the black community.

title: Commonwealth Games 2022 opening ceremony: 'It's Birmingham's turn to shine'
description: Steven Knight talks about masterminding the Commonwealth Games opening ceremony in his home city.

title: Kenya election: How a handshake changed Odinga's heartland
description: The BBC visits the home of presidential hopeful Raila Odinga, where a dramatic deal is paying off.

title: Chess Olympiad 2022: Medal rush expected for India amid home crowd cheers
description: Indian PM Narendra Modi is inaugurating the marquee tournament in Mamallapuram in south India.
